nodes.text: The Mark of Intellect was a sculpture. It was awarded to a spacer in 1.5 ABY after they completed a task in an effort to become a hero, which displayed their intellect and wisdom. When combined with the other "Mark" sculptures, it formed a spherical shape.
A spacer, under the task of a strange Rodian hermit, gained this sculpture after using their intellect to assist a bounty hunter in find her target amongst a group of smugglers on Tatooine.
